Albuquerque offers specialized antique appraisal services primarily through **Prestige Estate Services**, a leading firm serving New Mexico since at least 2017 ([Search Results](https://prestigeestateservices.com/locations/albuquerque-new-mexico/)). Below is a detailed directory based on available information:

---

## **Antique Appraisal Overview**  
Albuquerque‚Äôs market relies heavily on certified professionals adhering to **Uniform Standards of Professional Appraisal Practice (USPAP)** guidelines for IRS compliance ([Search Results](https://prestigeestateservices.com/locations/albuquerque-new-mexico/)). Common uses include insurance documentation, estate settlements/donation valuations ($10k+ items), divorce proceedings ([Search Results](https://prestigeestateservices.com/appraisals/antique-appraisal/)).

---

## **List of Antique Appraisers**  

### **Prestige Estate Services**  
*Team Members*:
- **Edward Kitson**: Specializes in estate tax valuations & provenance research.
- **Elizabeth Lovett**: Expertise in fine art collections & historical artifacts.
- **Stephanie Calman**: Focused on mid-century furniture/applied arts authentication ([Search Results](https://prestigeestateservices.com/locations/albuquerque-new-mexico/)).

*Business Details*:
- Founded: ~2017
- Certifications:
  - International Society of Appraisers (**ISA**) members
  - USPAP-compliant reports
- Service Methods:
   - In-person inspections
   - Remote photo-based evaluations  
   - Virtual consultations via video call  

---

## **Service Areas & Pricing**  
**Locations Covered**:  
Greater Albuquerque metro area including Corrales/Rio Rancho/Sandia Heights/North Valley/Los Ranchos de Albuquerque ([Search Results](https://prestigeestateservices.com/locations/albuquerque-new-mexico/)).

**Typical Costs**:  
Varies by complexity/method:
- Photo-based valuations start at ~$150/item 
- Full onsite collection assessments range $500‚Äì$3k+ depending on size/time required ([Search Results](https://prestigeestateservices.com/appraisals/antique-appraisal/)).

---

## **Contact Information**
**Address**:   
300 Menaul Blvd NW | Suite A | Albuquerque NM 87107  

**Phone**:   
(844) 378‚Äë7253  

**Website**:   
[https://presticeappraisealbuqerqueNM.prestige-estate-services.org](https://www.presticeappraisealbuqerqueNM.prestige-estate-services.org)

*(Note: Business hours unlisted)*

## Directory of Antique Appraisers in Anchorage  

### Overview  
Anchorage hosts specialized appraisal services focused on estates collectibles Alaskana Native art historical artifacts Notable providers combine auction house expertise formal USPAP-compliant valuations  

---

### Listed Professionals  

#### **Alaska Premier Auctions & Appraisals**  
- **Specialties**: Fine art Native artifacts coins currency estates jewelry insurance/tax valuations  
- **Years Active**: Since January *2018*  
- **Certifications**: USPAP-compliant IRS-accepted reports verified by peer review process  
- **Service Area**: Global online bidding + onsite evaluations across Southcentral AK  
- **Pricing**: Free initial assessments commission-based sales fees (~15‚Äì25%) $150+ hourly formal appraisal rates   
- *Contact*: üìç325 W Potter Dr | ‚òéÔ∏è(907)570‚Äì7050 | üïíMon‚ÄìFri *9AM‚Äì5PM*

- **Years Active**: Operated >40 yrs (*1983‚Äì2025*)
